title: Land of Hoge
text:
A virtual brand activating play, experience and earn
metaverse built in NFT Worlds. A web2 to web3 brand
activator providing a path to market for the legacy industries of today.

A play, experience, socialize and earn ecosystem with game mechanics to cater to the legacy and blockchain gaming audiences.

HOGE is focused on bridging the gap between legacy gaming and blockchain based gaming to usher in the evolved play and earn gaming web3 industry.

Built in the largest multi metaverse in existence NFT Worlds.

Built on top of open sourced Minecraft Home to 90m+ active players a month.

A forever digital home for our deployed IP and community to integrate with.
